title: Ping Increase After Patch 7.4
body: I hope I am not the only one that is having this problem but ever since patch 7.4 was installed, I have been having hellish spikes in my ping and now it is unstable. I don`t understand what happened to the connection between me and the server. It has made League unplayable for me and sadness ensues D: . Really want to get back with my clan and play more ranked but this ping would have me Bronze 5 in no time.  Hope to get some help ASAP on how to fix it  so i can play again. Please, if anyone has any insight on this issues please respond.

replies.body: I'm having the same issue. Still not sure whats causing the issue. I just created a similar post as well. Was hoping patch 7.5 would some how fix the issue, but it didn't.

Yeah i was thinking the same but unfortunately 7.5 only addressed some bugs to the game so far as i know. (Dont really know for certain because i am mia atm for league due to the ping issues).  I hope something gets fixed or addressed and solved soon so that i can play again.
First time commenting on a Forum here, but totally agree with you !! Im normaly at a 40 ping since this Patch im randomly on 60 or even 90 with no one using the internet.. pissing me off

Just as you said, high ping spikes is most likely due to an unstable connection between your network and our game servers. Let's go through our [Connections Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to get to the root of your problem. 

Hit me back up if you have any other questions!

I don`t think we hit the question that i have. My purpose in posting this was to find out what was done in 7.4 to change my ping "if that was the case" i`ve NEVER had ping this horrid before ever since i started playing league. This only occurred after 7.4 patch and I am looking to solve this solution.

League is an always online game, and since connections can degrade over time, doing some upgrades every now and then can help you keep a more stable connection. Sometimes all your network needs is a little pick-me-up.

Let me know if you're still having these ping spikes after looking over the [Connection Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues).
wifi can cause that if a bunch of people using it. Put ethernet in and you will have low stable ping hope that helps.
